article: taiwan power company -lrb- taipower -rrb- will benefit from a relaxed mainland investment policy , as the state-run firm has gained approval from the republic of china government to purchase coal from mainland china to fuel its electricity generators .
abstract: taipower to buy coal from mainland china through long-term contracts
